title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully with valid credentials and the system correctly establishes their role.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username and password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login is successful.
Verify that the user role (admin, manager, buyer) is correctly established and reflected in the session.

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that the system rejects login attempts with invalid username or password and displays an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username and/or password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login is denied.
Verify that an error message indicating invalid credentials is displayed.

title: Natural Language Query Successful Processing
description: Verify that the conversational agent processes valid Portuguese natural language queries correctly and returns accurate textual or visual responses.

steps.description: Log in as a manager user.
Enter a valid, complex Portuguese natural language query into the conversational agent.
Verify the query is processed successfully with response accuracy above 95%.
Verify the system displays an accurate textual answer or renders the appropriate visualization (chart or table) based on the query.

title: Natural Language Query Handling of Unsupported or Ambiguous Queries
description: Verify that the conversational agent handles unsupported, ambiguous, or malformed Portuguese queries gracefully by providing meaningful error or clarification messages.

steps.description: Log in as a manager user.
Enter an ambiguous or unsupported Portuguese natural language query into the conversational agent.
Verify that the system does not crash or hang.
Verify that a meaningful error or clarification message is displayed to the user.

title: Dashboard Loading Time Performance
description: Verify that the main dashboard loads and displays all key corporate KPIs within 5 seconds under typical usage conditions.

steps.description: Log in as a manager user.
Navigate to the main dashboard.
Measure and verify that the dashboard and all KPI visualizations load completely within 5 seconds.

title: Interactive Dashboard Filtering and Sorting
description: Verify users can apply filters and sorting on dashboard data and the visualizations update correctly in real-time.

steps.description: Log in as a manager user.
Navigate to an interactive dashboard with filtering and sorting features.
Apply data filters using provided UI controls.
Apply sorting on dashboard tables or charts.
Verify that the visualizations update correctly reflecting the filtered and sorted data.

title: Drill-Down Capability in Dashboards
description: Verify that users can drill-down into dashboard data points to explore detailed data without errors and with relevant data shown.

steps.description: Log in as a manager user.
Open a dashboard with drill-down enabled charts.
Perform drill-down action on a chart data point.
Verify that the system displays detailed data related to the selected data point.
Verify no visual or performance issues occur during drill-down.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that access control policies restrict users based on their roles (admin, manager, buyer) to the correct features and data.

steps.description: Log in as an admin user.
Verify admin can access all features including pipeline monitoring, metadata catalog management, and user management.
Log out and log in as a manager user.
Verify manager can access conversational agent, dashboards, and filtering but not admin-only features.
Log out and log in as a buyer user.
Verify buyer has access to permitted dashboards and conversational queries but restricted from admin and manager features.

title: Pipeline Monitoring Interface Functionality
description: Verify that the pipeline monitoring interface accurately displays data integration status, health metrics, and alerts to administrators.

steps.description: Log in as an admin user.
Open the pipeline monitoring interface.
Verify display of correct pipeline statuses, error alerts, and integration health metrics.
Simulate a pipeline error scenario.
Verify that the interface updates to reflect pipeline failures and alerts.

title: Metadata Catalog Management by Admin
description: Verify that administrators can add, modify, enrich, and approve metadata entries in the metadata catalog correctly.

steps.description: Log in as an admin user.
Navigate to the metadata catalog management panel.
Add a new metadata entry with business context data.
Verify that the new metadata entry is saved and visible in the catalog.
Modify an existing metadata entry.
Verify that modifications are saved and reflected correctly.
Approve a pending metadata entry.
Verify the approved status is updated and affects data context properly.

title: Visualization Generation for Different Chart Types
description: Verify that the system dynamically generates bar charts, line charts, and pie charts correctly based on user requests through natural language queries.

steps.description: Log in as a manager user.
Submit natural language queries requesting bar charts, line charts, and pie charts respectively.
Verify each requested chart type is generated correctly with accurate and consistent data representation.

title: Conversation History Review
description: Verify that users can access and review their past queries and the corresponding insights in the conversation history interface.

steps.description: Log in as any user.
Make several natural language queries with the conversational agent.
Navigate to the conversation history section.
Verify that all previous queries and their corresponding textual and visual responses are correctly listed and accessible.

title: System Uptime Monitoring Compliance
description: Verify that system uptime meets or exceeds 99.9% as monitored and reported by production monitoring tools over a sustained period.

steps.description: Review system uptime metrics from production monitoring tools over at least 7 consecutive days.
Verify that uptime is equal or greater than 99.9%.

title: Security Vulnerability Scan - OWASP Top 10
description: Perform automated security scans to ensure that the system is protected against OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities, including injection, authentication flaws, and XSS.

steps.description: Run automated OWASP Top 10 vulnerability scans against authentication, API endpoints, and UI components.
Verify that no critical or high severity OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities are detected.

title: User Feedback Usability Check
description: Verify through user feedback surveys and observation that the interface is easy to use, intuitive, and requires minimal training.

steps.description: Collect user feedback after training and usage through surveys and interviews.
Verify that the majority of users report positive usability experience with minimal required training.

title: API Backend Query Processing Robustness
description: Verify that the backend APIs handle typical and edge case natural language query requests accurately and efficiently, returning correct responses or errors.

steps.description: Send a variety of typical valid natural language query requests to the backend API.
Verify correct processing and response content.
Send malformed or unsupported query requests to the backend API.
Verify the API returns informative error responses without crashing.

title: Authentication and Session Security
description: Verify secure login and session management, ensuring password protection and session expiry policies are enforced correctly.

steps.description: Attempt login with valid credentials and inspect session tokens.
Verify session tokens are securely generated and stored.
Attempt login with incorrect passwords multiple times.
Verify account lockout or throttling mechanisms are triggered as per security policy.
Verify session expires automatically after inactivity timeout.

title: Data Pipeline ETL Integrity
description: Verify that data extraction, transformation, and loading processes from SQL Server to Parquet files execute successfully and maintain data integrity.

steps.description: Trigger the data pipeline ETL process.
Verify no errors during ETL execution.
Verify that data in Parquet files matches source SQL Server data in terms of record counts and values.

title: Logging and Error Monitoring
description: Verify that all key system activities and errors are properly logged using the structured logging system and errors are monitored correctly.

steps.description: Perform normal user activities including logins, queries, and dashboard access.
Force some error conditions (e.g., query failure, invalid input).
Verify that all activities and errors are logged with correct detail in logs.
Verify that monitoring alerts are raised for critical errors.

title: Administration Panel User and Role Management
description: Verify that administrators can add, modify, assign roles, and delete user accounts correctly through the administration panel.

steps.description: Log in as admin user.
Navigate to the administration panel.
Create a new user account and assign roles.
Verify the new user account is created with correct roles.
Modify an existing userâ€™s roles.
Verify roles are updated and enforced.
Delete a user account.
Verify the user account is removed and login is no longer possible.
